quote: No struggle can ever succeed without women participating side by side with men.
name: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quote: I like the religion that teaches liberty, equality and fraternity.
name: B. R. Ambedkar

quote: The worst form of inequality is to try to make unequal things equal.
name: Aristotle

quote: There should be no discrimination against languages people speak, skin color, or religion.
name: Malala Yousafzai

quote: If we cannot now end our differences, at least we can help make the world safe for diversity.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: If you want to see the true measure of a man, watch how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.
name: J. K. Rowling

quote: Until we get equality in education, we won't have an equal society.
name: Sonia Sotomayor

quote: The earth is the mother of all people, and all people should have equal rights upon it.
name: Chief Joseph

quote: There never will be complete equality until women themselves help to make laws and elect lawmakers.
name: Susan B. Anthony

quote: Canada is the homeland of equality, justice and tolerance.
name: Kim Campbell

quote: We will never have true civilization until we have learned to recognize the rights of others.
name: Will Rogers

quote: All animals are equal, but some animals are more equal than others.
name: George Orwell

quote: The history of the past is but one long struggle upward to equality.
name: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quote: Equality is the soul of liberty; there is, in fact, no liberty without it.
name: Frances Wright

quote: Virtue can only flourish among equals.
name: Mary Wollstonecraft

quote: Liberty and equality are captivating sounds, but they often captivate to destroy.
name: John Tyler

quote: The emotional, sexual, and psychological stereotyping of females begins when the doctor says: It's a girl.
name: Shirley Chisholm

quote: All the people like us are we, and everyone else is They.
name: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Gender equality will only be reached if we are able to empower women.
name: Michelle Bachelet

quote: The idea of equal rights was in the air.
name: Lucy Stone

quote: Before God we are all equally wise - and equally foolish.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Americans are so enamored of equality that they would rather be equal in slavery than unequal in freedom.
name: Alexis de Tocqueville

quote: Marriage equality is about more than just marriage. It's about something greater. It's about acceptance.
name: Charlize Theron

quote: We came equals into this world, and equals shall we go out of it.
name: George Mason

quote: I am free of all prejudices. I hate everyone equally.
name: W. C. Fields

quote: Coming generations will learn equality from poverty, and love from woes.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: It is clear that not in one thing alone, but in many ways equality and freedom of speech are a good thing.
name: Herodotus

quote: The state controlling a woman would mean denying her full autonomy and full equality.
name: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quote: I want for myself what I want for other women, absolute equality.
name: Agnes Macphail

quote: I believe in unconditional love and equality. Jesus Christ exemplified these qualities.
name: Jack Canfield

quote: You learn about equality in history and civics, but you find out life is not really like that.
name: Arthur Ashe

quote: Equality is like gravity. We need it to stand on this earth as men and women.
name: Joss Whedon

quote: The true and solid peace of nations consists not in equality of arms, but in mutual trust alone.
name: Pope John XXIII

quote: All this talk about equality. The only thing people really have in common is that they are all going to die.
name: Bob Dylan

quote: Equality for women is progress for all.
name: Ban Ki-moon

quote: More countries have understood that women's equality is a prerequisite for development.
name: Kofi Annan

quote: American society will never completely understand the true meaning of equality.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: We want order and security, and we want liberty. And we want not only liberty but equality as well.
name: David Souter

quote: I'm a feminist in the true sense of the word. It's about equality.
name: Natalie Dormer

quote: The arc of our history is toward more equality being expanded to more and more people.
name: George Takei

quote: There's a beauty in being part of a band, when there's equality and trust.
name: Scott Weiland

quote: Sweden is a good country to raise a family in because there is an equality there I don't feel in the States.
name: Alexander Skarsgard

quote: There is no justice in social justice, and there is no equality in social equality.
name: Brad Thor

quote: Suffrage is the pivotal right.
name: Susan B. Anthony

quote: I believe in equality for everyone, except reporters and photographers.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The year was 2081, and everyone was finally equal.
name: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: Any serious shift towards more sustainable societies has to include gender equality.
name: Helen Clark

quote: Trust me that as I ignore all law to help the slave, so will I ignore it all to protect an enslaved woman.
name: Susan B. Anthony

quote: Democratic principles are the result of equality of condition.
name: Mercy Otis Warren

quote: Political Freedom without economic equality is a pretense, a fraud, a lie; and the workers want no lying.
name: Mikhail Bakunin

quote: Gender equality is not only an issue for women and girls.
name: Justin Trudeau

quote: The battle for women's rights has been largely won.
name: Margaret Thatcher

quote: All sports must be treated on the basis of equality.
name: Pierre de Coubertin

quote: Candor is a compliment; it implies equality. It's how true friends talk.
name: Peggy Noonan

quote: The wisdom of man never yet contrived a system of taxation that would operate with perfect equality.
name: Andrew Jackson

quote: Socialism values equality more than liberty.
name: Dennis Prager

quote: Sports are a great place to show that equality can happen.
name: Venus Williams

quote: A woman who thinks she is intelligent demands the same rights as man. An intelligent woman gives up.
name: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

quote: What I find most interesting about the U.S. is this idea of equality.
name: Jorge Ramos

quote: Disease generally begins that equality which death completes.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: The moral case for gender equality is obvious. It should not need any explanation.
name: Paul Polman

quote: 'Vote Love' means vote equality. It means vote change. It means vote what's right for humanity.
name: Macklemore

quote: All men are created equal, it is only men themselves who place themselves above equality.
name: David Allan Coe

quote: Free trade is very important if we respect equality among nations.
name: Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva

quote: There is no denying that we have made great progress toward gender equality.
name: Stephanie Coontz

quote: The extension of women's rights is the basic principle of all social progress.
name: Charles Fourier

quote: Private religious speech can't be discriminated against. It has to be treated equally with secular speech.
name: Samuel Alito

quote: The test for whether or not you can hold a job should not be the arrangement of your chromosomes.
name: Bella Abzug

quote: His lordship may compel us to be equal upstairs, but there will never be equality in the servants hall.
name: James M. Barrie

quote: As long as we set up equality, we'll go in the right direction.
name: Venus Williams

quote: Today, it's about gender equality, not neutrality. Anyone who doesn't agree would be a bit of an idiot.
name: Twinkle Khanna

quote: Do people really want liberty, equality, fraternity? Is it not some manner of speaking?
name: Krzysztof Kieslowski

quote: Equality implies individuality.
name: Trey Anastasio

quote: A resilient people cherishing liberty and equality and the rule of law will endure.
name: Nick Rahall

quote: We are coming down from our pedestal and up from the laundry room.
name: Bella Abzug

quote: I think preaching equality among unequals is the worst form of discrimination.
name: P. Chidambaram

quote: We are a model country where gender equality is concerned.
name: Tarja Halonen

quote: To be successful, a woman has to be much better at her job than a man.
name: Golda Meir

quote: At some point we have to stop and say, There's Marlee, not, There's the deaf actress.
name: Marlee Matlin

quote: A claim for equality of material position can be met only by a government with totalitarian powers.
name: Friedrich August von Hayek

quote: Do not call for black power or green power. Call for brain power.
name: Barbara Jordan

quote: Equality may perhaps be a right, but no power on earth can ever turn it into a fact.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: Equality and self-determination should never be divided in the name of religious or ideological fervor.
name: Rita Dove

quote: Women are the only exploited group in history to have been idealized into powerlessness.
name: Erica Jong

quote: The way the Democrats go about seeking equality is to lower people at the top.
name: Rush Limbaugh

quote: I'm an activist for gay marriage equality and children's rights. I'm the face of Share Our Strength.
name: Sandra Lee

quote: Inequality can have a bad downside, but equality, for its part, sure does get in the way of coordination.
name: Mary Douglas

quote: Each country has a soul, and France's soul is equality.
name: Francois Hollande

quote: Feminism, to me, is nothing more and nothing less than the belief in equality for women.
name: Kodie Shane

quote: Nobody really believes in equality anyway.
name: Warren Farrell

quote: I am a universalist, passionately devoted to the cause of equality within the human family.
name: Theodore Bikel

quote: You can't state difference and also state equality. We have to state sameness to understand equality.
name: Zadie Smith

quote: The seeds of marriage equality... were planted on MTV.
name: Wilson Cruz

quote: The only way to ensure equality for women is to clearly declare it in our Constitution.
name: Carolyn Maloney

quote: As equality increases, so does the number of people struggling for predominance.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: Jackie Robinson, as an athlete and as someone who was trying to make a stand for equality, he was exemplary.
name: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: Marriage equality is not a choice. It is a legal right.
name: Cory Booker

quote: Proclaim human equality as loudly as you like, Witless will serve his brother.
name: Thomas Huxley

quote: The cry of equality pulls everyone down.
name: Iris Murdoch

quote: I'm a Christian. I want the world of justice and equality. This is the only way to achieve peace.
name: Hugo Chavez

quote: Marriage equality is not an issue of politics: it is an issue of justice achieved by political means.
name: Andy Dunn

quote: Equality as a principle is at the heart of our democracy.
name: Raja Krishnamoorthi

quote: Any government I lead will continue with the equality of gay and lesbian people.
name: David Cameron

quote: Gender equality is one of the principles we will never compromise at Accenture.
name: Pierre Nanterme

quote: Marriage equality changed life for people.
name: Andrew Cuomo

quote: In New York City, the idea that district schools advance equality is a myth.
name: Eva Moskowitz

quote: One hundred and fifty years after Lincoln's Gettysburg Address, equality for many Americans remains elusive.
name: Mike Quigley

quote: Bumble is about equality. We are reverse-engineering traditional societal norms.
name: Whitney Wolfe Herd

quote: I see social mobility and equality of opportunity as really successful Canadian values.
name: Chrystia Freeland

quote: We live in a world where equality is pretty important.
name: John Key

quote: In 1965, I marched for equality.
name: Alphonso Jackson

quote: All imaginable futures are not equally possible.
name: Kevin Kelly

quote: In science, all facts, no matter how trivial or banal, enjoy democratic equality.
name: Mary McCarthy

quote: True gender equality in Scotland - and elsewhere - is still some way off.
name: Nicola Sturgeon

quote: Fairness is not about statistical equality.
name: John Bercow

quote: Equality and development will not be achieved however if peace is not understood from women's' point of view.
name: Jenny Shipley

quote: Conservatives often say that we should care not about equality of outcomes but about equality of opportunity.
name: Timothy Noah

quote: Republican presidents talk about freedom. Democratic presidents talk about equality.
name: Timothy Noah

quote: Marriage equality is coming, and not merely to a theater near you.
name: Suzanne Brockmann

quote: I am for 100% equality across the board for everybody, in all walks of life.
name: David Furnish

quote: I never understood why women wanted equality in the workplace when in fact, that would be selling them short.
name: Jay Samit

quote: Equality for everybody is great. That would be amazing.
name: Rob Lowe

quote: Equality and separation cannot exist in the same space.
name: Jason Mraz

quote: Together, we can build the kind of world in which we all seek to live, one of universal equality and justice.
name: Lynn Schusterman

quote: In order to be great, you just have to care. You have to care about your world, community, and equality.
name: Katori Hall

quote: Equality should be a thing we don't even have to talk about anymore.
name: Hilary Knight

quote: Sharing presumes and creates equality.
name: Clemantine Wamariya

quote: I'm all for the equality.
name: Rumer Willis

quote: I just believe in equality for all.
name: Ashley Wagner

quote: Give us equality of enjoyment, equal right to expansion - it is as necessary to our prosperity as yours.
name: Robert Toombs

quote: Growing up, my parents treated my brother and me with absolute equality.
name: Anushka Sharma

quote: Equality under the law is the slow triumph of hope over history.
name: Jim Cooper

quote: The battle goes on for me; as a gay man, I shall not be happy until I see equality across the board.
name: Rob Halford

quote: Such security is equal liberty. But it is not necessarily equality in the use of the earth.
name: Benjamin Tucker

quote: If we are Russian citizens, treat us as Russian citizens. We want equality and justice.
name: Ramzan Kadyrov

quote: I want girls to know that equality exists in this world. You can do anything you want.
name: Yuna

quote: In the end no segregationist scheme has withstood the force of a simple idea: equality under law.
name: Eric Liu

quote: The sole equality on earth is death.
name: Philip James Bailey

quote: My brother had the courage to come out in 1978, when equality was still a distant dream.
name: Elizabeth Esty

quote: We really need to come behind and press for marriage equality in Northern Ireland.
name: Leo Varadkar

quote: The highest political buzz word is not liberty, equality, fraternity or solidarity; it is service.
name: Arthur Hugh Clough

quote: All men are born equally free.
name: Salmon P. Chase

quote: The women's movement in the 1970s led more women into the workforce and got them closer to pay equality.
name: Rebecca Traister

quote: I am an aristocrat. I love liberty; I hate equality.
name: John Randolph

quote: An idea like equality between men and women, which is now accepted in the West, is quite new.
name: Antonio Munoz Molina

quote: A few British suffragettes everybody laughed at started the cause of equality between men and women.
name: Antonio Munoz Molina

quote: Equality in education is my number one battle.
name: Najat Vallaud-Belkacem

quote: Is it written that equality between men and women means one can change sex? Obviously not.
name: Najat Vallaud-Belkacem

quote: Everybody thinks that equality comes from identifying people, and that's not where equality comes from.
name: Matt Bomer

quote: We have equality of men and women in western society, whereas in Islamic culture, women are inferior to men.
name: Pim Fortuyn

quote: I feel like a feminist is gender equality.
name: Ilana Glazer

quote: Really, feminism is just about equality, and that's all. It's just saying equal rights.
name: Abi Morgan

quote: I wouldn't really call myself a feminist. I obviously want equality and equal opportunities to the men.
name: Katie Taylor

quote: We don't live in a society that has genuine equality, and every woman we know has experienced that.
name: Sara Sheridan

quote: I want my daughters to live in a world where there is equality and parity of pay.
name: Joseph Fiennes

quote: I want to organize so that women see ourselves as people who are entitled to power, entitled to leadership.
name: Patricia Ireland

quote: Stewardesses are still paid so little that in many cases, new hires qualify for food stamps.
name: Patricia Ireland

quote: Under Tunisian law, a woman can divorce her husband. Total equality.
name: Rashid al-Ghannushi

quote: We are also further than ever from equality of opportunity.
name: Ferdinand Mount

quote: Democracy does not guarantee equality of conditions - it only guarantees equality of opportunity.
name: Irving Kristol

quote: I don't believe in social equality, and they know it.
name: George Smathers

quote: Demands for equality for women are threats to men's self-esteem and sense of sexual turf.
name: Alice S. Rossi

quote: I refuse to consign the whole male sex to the nursery. I insist on believing that some men are my equals.
name: Brigid Brophy

quote: Equality means nothing unless incorporated into the institutions.
name: Slobodan Milosevic
